sep_scene.content: In this image, we see the actress Diane Keaton, known for her role as Susan Carter in the movie "The Devil's Thieves". She is seated at a desk in an office setting, engaged in a conversation on her phone. Dressed in a black suit and tie, she exudes an air of professionalism. The office is dimly lit, with a man standing in the background, adding to the intensity of the scene.
